short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your digital life with Pass Protect, the ultimate password manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pass Protect is the ultimate solution to securely store and manage all your passwords in one place. Say goodbye to the hassle of remembering multiple complex passwords, with Pass Protect, you can effortlessly safeguard your valuable credentials and access them whenever you need from any of your devices!

Here are our key features:

Secure password storage: We encrypt all of your passwords so that even we can't access them, your passwords are only decrypted on your device and you're the only one who can see them!

Auto-Fill: This extension allows you to easily fill forms with your usernames, passwords, credit card information, addresses, phone numbers and more!

Password generator: We offer a secure password generator to help you have a safe and unique password for every service you use!

Store other sensitive information: We help you securely store information such as Credit cards, secure notes, and personal information such as phone numbers and email addresses
